statements: SELECT user_id, username FROM user_authentication;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE password_salt = 'abc123';
SELECT user_id, password_salt FROM user_authentication WHERE multi_factor_enabled = true;
SELECT username, password_hash, multi_factor_enabled FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM user_authentication ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE multi_factor_enabled = true AND password_salt LIKE '%abc%';
SELECT COUNT(user_id) as total_users FROM user_authentication;
SELECT user_id, username, password_hash FROM user_authentication WHERE password_salt = 'xyz' OR multi_factor_enabled = true;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT id, username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE id = 5;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT id, username, email, mfa_enabled FROM user_accounts WHERE mfa_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE mfa_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM access_logs WHERE successful_login = FALSE;
SELECT user_id, login_time, ip_address FROM access_logs ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT username, password FROM user_accounts WHERE email LIKE 'admin%';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT user_id, username, created_at FROM user_accounts WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username, created_at FROM user_accounts ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT user_id, username, password_hash FROM user_accounts WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, password_hash FROM password_history ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, otp_secret FROM multi_factor_auth WHERE is_enabled = true ORDER BY last_used DESC;
SELECT user_id, password_hash, change_date FROM password_history WHERE change_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE role_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM authentication_logs WHERE success = true ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name='admin';
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u INNER JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT u.username, a.login_time FROM users u LEFT JOIN authentication_logs a ON u.id = a.user_id WHERE a.success=true;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(*) AS login_count FROM users u INNER JOIN authentication_logs a ON u.id = a.user_id GROUP BY u.username ORDER BY login_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_credentials;
SELECT username, password FROM user_credentials WHERE multi_factor_auth = TRUE;
SELECT password FROM user_credentials WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT timestamp FROM access_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, num_attempts FROM failed_logins WHERE num_attempts > 3;
SELECT * FROM user_credentials;
SELECT username, password FROM user_credentials WHERE multi_factor_auth = TRUE;
SELECT username, password, multi_factor_auth FROM user_credentials WHERE password LIKE '%secret%';
SELECT username, timestamp FROM login_attempts ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, num_attempts FROM failed_logins WHERE num_attempts > 5 ORDER BY num_attempts DESC;
